author: Conor Duffy
title: Cooking is chemistry and education is everywhere: Teachers share lessons in homeschooling
description: As parents across Australia try their hand at being teachers for the first time, principals and experts warn children's anxiety levels could rise and share advice on how to make home an effective school.
content:
Posted 
March 25, 2020 06:03:42
As parents across Australia try their hand at being teachers for the first time, principals and experts are warning anxiety levels could spike in their children.
